body:
DEVELOPING: Wisconsin Gov. Scott Walker, once a leading candidate in the Republican presidential race, will announce Monday that he is suspending his campaign, Fox News confirms.
Walker once was leading in some polls, but has seen his position in the polls deteriorate amid the rise of front-runner Donald Trump and a number of missteps from the candidate himself.
The decision is expected to be announced at a press conference at 6 p.m. ET. 
He becomes to second GOP candidate to suspend his campaign, following former Gov. Rick Perry.
title: Wisconsin Gov. Scott Walker to suspend GOP presidential campaign
